question.para: Why is there no content here?

answer.para: This site is still under construction. Contents may appear in the near future.
CMView was developed by the Structural Proteomics Group at the Max Planck Institute for Molecular Genetics.

question.para: What are the license terms for CMView?

answer.para: CMView will be released under an open source license. If you use CMView in your study we ask you to cite this website.

question.para: How to cite the CMView software?

answer.para: A publication describing CMView is being prepared. For the moment, please use the following citation:

para.emphasis: CMView: Interactive Contact Map Visualization and Analysis. http://www.molgen.mpg.de/~lappe/cmview/.

question.para: I am getting a Java out of memory exception.

answer.para: For large proteins the contact map calculation may use up substantial amounts of main memory. Try setting the -Xmx parameter in the startup script to a bigger number (e.g. 512M or 1024M).
